alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 10:30PM CDT until September 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LEAKE...SOUTHEASTERN ATTALA...SOUTHWESTERN WINSTON AND NORTHWESTERN NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 1030 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Edinburg, or near Pearl River, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Leake, southeastern Attala, southwestern Winston and northwestern Neshoba Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
